name: Inscribe
headline: Risk Ops Automation
description: Inscribe’s award-winning Risk Intelligence technology is the most effective way for fintechs and banks to automate manual reviews. Inscribe can reduce fraud losses and operational costs while increasing the accuracy and efficiency of risk decisions. Founded in 2017, Inscribe is trusted by leading fintechs like TripActions, Plaid, Bluevine, and Ramp. Inscribe is backed by Threshold Ventures, Uncork Capital, Y Combinator, Crosslink Capital, and Foundry, and is headquartered in San Francisco, CA. Learn more at inscribe.ai.

# Introducing our newest AI Agent: the AI Fraud Analyst
Inscribe's AI Fraud Analyst automates manual fraud reviews so risk teams can spend less time on in-depth investigations and more time converting trustworthy customers.
[Book Demo](https://www.inscribe.ai/</demo-request>)
[See Product Tour](https://www.inscribe.ai/<https:/www.inscribe.ai/ai-risk-agents/ai-fraud-analyst#fraud-analyst-demo>)

## Inscribe ROI
1.5Mins
To review 30 customer applications
99%
Reduction in manual review times
$85k+
In additional productivity per full time employee
## Why Inscribe
### Automate complex workflows with AI
Here's why leading fintechs, banks, and lenders are automating complex, onboarding and underwriting workflows with pre-trained AI Risk Agents and powerful risk features.
# Do more with less headcount
Risk and ops teams face unprecedented resource constraints — reduced budgets, hiring freezes, and limited engineering resources. With our AI Risk Agents, you can boost your team’s efficiency without increasing budget or headcount and quickly scale as your needs evolve.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238f829b2fff96d51f59113/65246bbc21ceee7e37e74cf3_stickyblock_1.svg)
# Eliminate tedious review tasks
In an ultra-competitive market, fast response times are everything. Inscribe’s AI Risk Agents connect the dots across all your systems, so your team can focus on strategies for approving more customers, faster (instead of tedious tasks).
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238f829b2fff96d51f59113/65246c50dc8e7689b490de11_stickyblock_2.svg)
# Reduce avoidable fraud losses
Shrinking margins and the macro environment mean that fraud and credit losses are no longer an acceptable cost of doing business. Inscribe uses the most advanced AI and machine learning technology to illuminate fraud and credit risks undetectable to human reviewers.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238f829b2fff96d51f59113/65246cbb8439afbd9db01455_stickyblock_3.svg)
## Solutions
### State-of-the-art AI for risk teams
AI Risk Agents
Risk Features
Our AI Risk Agents can read, write, and reason just like their human counterparts, but without the risk of human error. They autonomously perform routine tasks for onboarding and underwriting, including coordinating the outputs of various systems, summarizing findings, and recommending next steps. Because they run in parallel, 24/7, they have an uncapped ability to scale with team members and resources. 
[See All Agents](https://www.inscribe.ai/</ai-risk-agents>)
If you’re not quite ready to get started with AI Risk Agents, you can leverage our fraud detection, document parsing, and cashflow analysis features. Because these features have been trained on the largest, most diverse network of real-world documents from banks, fintechs, and lenders since 2017, they consistently deliver data you can trust.
[See All Features](https://www.inscribe.ai/</risk-features>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238f829b2fff96d51f59113/6658a3b3f9e3a7048f114e49_home-risk-agents2-2x_tiny.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238f829b2fff96d51f59113/6658a3b35cb1abc5ab1dda77_home-models2x_tiny.png)
# AI Risk Agents
Our AI Risk Agents can read, write, and reason just like their human counterparts, but without the risk of human error. They autonomously perform routine tasks for onboarding and underwriting, including coordinating the outputs of various systems, summarizing findings, and recommending next steps. Because they run in parallel, 24/7, they have an uncapped ability to scale with team members and resources. 
[See All Agents](https://www.inscribe.ai/</ai-risk-agents>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238f829b2fff96d51f59113/6658a3b3f9e3a7048f114e49_home-risk-agents2-2x_tiny.png)
# Risk Models
If you’re not quite ready to get started with AI Risk Agents, you can leverage our state-of-the-art machine learning Models, including fraud detection, document parsing, and cashflow analysis. Because our Models have been trained on the largest, most diverse network of real-world documents from banks, fintechs, and lenders since 2017, they consistently deliver data you can trust.
[See All Models](https://www.inscribe.ai/</risk-features>)

# Introducing our newest AI Agent: the AI Fraud Analyst
Inscribe's AI Fraud Analyst automates manual fraud reviews so risk teams can spend less time on in-depth investigations and more time converting trustworthy customers.
Book Demo⟨11⟩
See Product Tour⟨13⟩
![⟨14⟩![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238f829b2fff96d51f59113/678ac6e3af5bb9be7a313e43_small-solid-play-2.svg)Try InscribeSee how it works](https://www.inscribe.ai/<#>)
![Plaid⟨15⟩]![Navan⟨16⟩]![Ramp⟨17⟩]![bluevine⟨18⟩]![Coast⟨19⟩]![airbase⟨20⟩]
## Inscribe ROI
1.5Mins
To review 30 customer applications
99%

$85k+

## Why Inscribe
### Automate complex workflows with AI
Here's why leading fintechs, banks, and lenders are automating complex, onboarding and underwriting workflows with pre-trained AI Risk Agents and powerful risk features.
# Do more with less headcount
Risk and ops teams face unprecedented resource constraints — reduced budgets, hiring freezes, and limited engineering resources. With our AI Risk Agents, you can boost your team’s efficiency without increasing budget or headcount and quickly scale as your needs evolve.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238f829b2fff96d51f59113/65246bbc21ceee7e37e74cf3_stickyblock_1.svg)
# Eliminate tedious review tasks
In an ultra-competitive market, fast response times are everything. Inscribe’s AI Risk Agents connect the dots across all your systems, so your team can focus on strategies for approving more customers, faster (instead of tedious tasks).
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238f829b2fff96d51f59113/65246c50dc8e7689b490de11_stickyblock_2.svg)
# Reduce avoidable fraud losses
Shrinking margins and the macro environment mean that fraud and credit losses are no longer an acceptable cost of doing business. Inscribe uses the most advanced AI and machine learning technology to illuminate fraud and credit risks undetectable to human reviewers.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238f829b2fff96d51f59113/65246cbb8439afbd9db01455_stickyblock_3.svg)
## Solutions
### State-of-the-art AI for risk teams
AI Risk Agents
Risk Features
Our AI Risk Agents can read, write, and reason just like their human counterparts, but without the risk of human error. They autonomously perform routine tasks for onboarding and underwriting, including coordinating the outputs of various systems, summarizing findings, and recommending next steps. Because they run in parallel, 24/7, they have an uncapped ability to scale with team members and resources. 
See All Agents⟨21⟩
If you’re not quite ready to get started with AI Risk Agents, you can leverage our fraud detection, document parsing, and cashflow analysis features. Because these features have been trained on the largest, most diverse network of real-world documents from banks, fintechs, and lenders since 2017, they consistently deliver data you can trust.
See All Features⟨22⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238f829b2fff96d51f59113/6658a3b3f9e3a7048f114e49_home-risk-agents2-2x_tiny.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238f829b2fff96d51f59113/6658a3b35cb1abc5ab1dda77_home-models2x_tiny.png)
# AI Risk Agents
Our AI Risk Agents can read, write, and reason just like their human counterparts, but without the risk of human error. They autonomously perform routine tasks for onboarding and underwriting, including coordinating the outputs of various systems, summarizing findings, and recommending next steps. Because they run in parallel, 24/7, they have an uncapped ability to scale with team members and resources. 
See All Agents⟨21⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238f829b2fff96d51f59113/6658a3b3f9e3a7048f114e49_home-risk-agents2-2x_tiny.png)
# Risk Models
If you’re not quite ready to get started with AI Risk Agents, you can leverage our state-of-the-art machine learning Models, including fraud detection, document parsing, and cashflow analysis. Because our Models have been trained on the largest, most diverse network of real-world documents from banks, fintechs, and lenders since 2017, they consistently deliver data you can trust.
See All Models⟨22⟩

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Inscribe**

**Overview**  
Inscribe is a cutting-edge company focused on automating risk operations for fintechs and banks. Founded in 2017 as part of Y Combinator's Batch S18, it has quickly become a trusted name in the financial sector. Headquartered in San Francisco, California, Inscribe employs a team of 47 talented individuals and is backed by prominent investors including Threshold Ventures, Uncork Capital, and Crosslink Capital.

**Mission**  
Inscribe's mission revolves around "Risk Ops Automation." Their goal is to minimize manual review processes especially in risk management, thus reducing fraud losses and operational costs while enhancing the accuracy and efficiency of risk decisions.

**Key Offerings**  
Inscribe’s award-winning Risk Intelligence technology offers innovative AI-driven solutions, such as:

1. **AI Risk Agents**: These state-of-the-art agents are designed to perform onboarding and underwriting tasks autonomously. This includes:
   - **AI Fraud Analyst**: Automates fraud review processes, allowing teams to focus on deeper investigations.
   - **AI Compliance Analyst**: Streamlines Know Your Business (KYB) checks with comprehensive document analysis.

2. **Risk Features**: Inscribe provides a variety of advanced features that facilitate document parsing, fraud detection, transaction enrichment, and more, enabling risk teams to operate more efficiently.

**Customer Base**  
Inscribe has attracted an impressive clientele, which includes leading fintech companies like Plaid, Ramp, Bluevine, and TripActions. This influence in fintech showcases the effectiveness of their risk automation technologies.

**Unique Value Proposition**  
The company is positioned uniquely in the market as it combines AI capabilities with practical applications in finance. By automating tedious tasks, Inscribe allows risk teams to allocate their time and resources more effectively—enabling them to approve trustworthy customers faster while reducing operational burdens.

**Achievements**  
- **Operational Efficiency**: They boast a 99% reduction in manual review times and $85k+ in additional productivity per full-time employee.
- **Recognition**: The technology has received accolades for its ability to reveal insights that traditional methods might miss, strengthening the case for automation in risk operations.

If you're curious about leveraging AI to transform your risk operations, visit [Inscribe.ai](https://www.inscribe.ai/) for more details.
